Reviews.Title: THIS TV IS A JOKE- DON'T BUY INTO IT
Reviews.Author: jepayero "jepayero"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV in June of 2006, by December of 2006, the remote or the buttons in the TV wouldn't work.The remote that comes with your cable or satellite dish cannot be program to work with this TV,so at the moment I'm stuck with the volume the TV was set when stop working.I cannot change anything in this 700 Dollar TV.  Never had a TV stop working so early.  Went to Walmart to see if they could give me another TV, or help me with a solution, but you know the rap " Well your 90 days warranty from the store has expired" They suggested to call the ILO customer service number to arrange for parts since the ILO TV comes with a part warranty for a year, Well let me tell you that is another experience of their own.You call the number and an automated computer service center answer the phone and tell you, you are caller number 20, and every 5 minutes will tell you, now you are caller number 19 and so on, until it gets to number one.  Then when it get to your number it will say, we are transfering you to a representative to get your call, suddenly the automated computer picks up the line and tell you all the representatives are busy, please leave a message for someone to call you within 24 hours.Just when you think you will see the light of this horrendous day, the automated machine tell you, you cannot leave a message because the message box is full.  If after all this you still feel like you want to buy this TV, make sure you buy some warranty, and a lot of aspirin pill for the headaches down the road.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: adriftinpa
Reviews.Content: This is a Wal-Mart brand made by @ 4 manufacturers. My 26 inch died within a year. You had to turn it on and off and on to get it to work, then the motherboard fried and it is stuck on one channel.This is reported to be a common problem on all their TV's. The TV buttons and remote no longer work. I googled ilo 26 repairs and this is a common problem. Its almost impossible to get repaired or to even find out who made it. Please don't by ANY ILO products as they are junk.

Reviews.Title: The company should go out of bussiness with such unreliable product.
Reviews.Author: Janusz Pedzinski "jp"
Reviews.Content: My TV suddenly stop working.I got only one channel and TV can't be adjusted/controlled.Based on other reviews dealing with the manufacturer is nothing short of nightmare.I have decided to throw it in garbage along with $500 I spent on it.j.pedzinski

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: LatinFlyer
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for about three years though it's only used for games, not watching TV. So far it works fine, sound could be better and the picture quality is not as sharp as you would like.

Reviews.Title: A Real POS!
Reviews.Author: Whodat Whodare "Bob"
Reviews.Content: My father purchased this thing about 15 months ago.The HDMI outputs don't work,(thought it was a bad cable)Both of the composite outputs don't work.Can only get the S-Video, and component outputs to work. Save your money, buy anything but an ilo brand.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Crap
Reviews.Author: Wolfking
Reviews.Content: Well, if all you want is something the equivalent of an oversized computer monitor... go for it.The remote & side panel buttons will die within six months due to achingly crappy quality control during manufacturing.  The picture will still work fine, so if you're using something else to provide audio you're good... oh, and something else to change channels, too.Definitely NOT worth $200, or even $100, except as a computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: First HDTV Widescreen ever bought
Reviews.Author: sweet_thing
Reviews.Content: First of all I bought this TV back in 2004,The remote is fine NEVER had any problems with it, (AWSOME) Picture, makes for a great TV & Computer Monitor it has VGA and DVI hook up's.The best HDTV widescreen i have ever bought....... Love it. :)
